subject: Baseball
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Speaking to Emory University students, Chipper Jones, the former Braves star, told his story of staying focused on his career goals, admitting when he was wrong and giving back.
snippet: Speaking to Emory University students, Chipper Jones, the former Braves star, told his story of staying focused on his career goals, admitting when he was wrong and giving back.
